text: The lieutenant governor of Arizona is a position that currently does not exist yet. The lieutenant governor will be the first in line to replace the governor of Arizona when the governor dies, resigns or is removed from office. This office will be higher ranking than the current second highest state ranked office of secretary of State. In November 2022, the office was created after voters approved proposition 131.Arizona voters approve Proposition 131 to create lieutenant governor position == References == Category:Arizona Category:State lieutenant governors of the United States
title: Lieutenant Governor of Arizona
